name: Richard M. HARRIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
